caption.center: NICHOLAS A. TAWIL, APPELLANT, v. CARIDAD TAWIL, APPELLEE.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

date.center: As Corrected on Denial of Rehearing September 22, 1987.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Dade County; Francis X. Knuck, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Shorenstein Lewis, Miami, for appellant.
The Vogelsang Law Firm and Beth Tyler Vogelsang, Miami, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before HENDRY, BASKIN and DANIEL S. PEARSON, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed. Diffenderfer v. Diffenderfer, 491 So.2d 265 (Fla. 1986); Canakaris v. Canakaris, 382 So.2d 1197 (Fla. 1980);Cowan v. Cowan, 389 So.2d 1187 (Fla. 5th DCA 1980), reviewdenied, 397 So.2d 777 (Fla. 1981).
